Plot: The owner of a Miami restaurant indebted to the mob institutes a contest to see what waiter can earn the most money in one night.
Title: The Slammin' Salmon
Writer: Jay Chandrasekhar, Kevin Heffernan, Steve Lemme, Paul Soter, Erik Stolhanske
Actors: Kevin Heffernan, Jeff Chase, Carla Gallo, Paul Soter
tomatoConsensus: Potty humor and juvenile antics keep this workplace comedy from being particularly funny or memorable.
